attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Brown, 
 
Can you please sort this country out?  It’s in a complete and utter mess and appears to be getting worse.  
 
Public transport, social housing, immigration, health care -   It is all a big shambles. 

We are destined for an economic decline, and/or a public revolt
 
Take action and fast.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
